price: Eyyûb’u da an. Hani o Rabbine: “Şüphesiz ki ben derde uğradım, sen ise merhametlilerin en merhametlisisin” diye niyaz etmişti.
arabic: ۞ وَأَيُّوبَ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّي مَسَّنِيَ ٱلضُّرُّ وَأَنتَ أَرۡحَمُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-ayyūba idh nādā rabbahu annī massaniya al-ḍuru wa-anta arḥamu al-rāḥimīna
